曼城,頂多都只係6個月
但係巴禾過去一年的時間?

點解大家好似一點印象都無
記憶比篡改了?還是時間被盜走了
是神偷了?是祖赫特偷了?還是巴禾自己偷了

一個西甲,一個國王盃,一個美洲國家盃,一個美洲國家盃最佳門將
它們到底去了邊?
點解大家只把重點收在巴禾在曼城既小小失敗
而忘記了它們?

話巴禾唔識撲球,自己睇下西甲撲球數據
話巴禾黑面,自己睇下巴禾平時接受待人接物,有幾好笑容
巴塞好多隊友都話巴禾最好相處 更衣室入邊最無架子

唔想有好似ONE PIECE咁既團結志同道合的夥伴
無啊,佢只係一個愛德華艾力克
手腳受傷了,要獨自背負罪名去阻擋入球

點解短短幾個月
一向團結既高登會變到分裂

Gerard Pique will not keep quiet. He speaks and he speaks clearly. He says what he thinks and he takes responsibility for his actions.
He went into the game against Villarreal surrounded by controversy due to his comments about referees after the game against Athletic Club and he reaffirmed his feelings on Sunday. 
"I still think the same as the other day in Bilbao,” he said. “You have to be careful because they analyse everything -- but let them analyse [my comments] and waste time with that, that’s their right."
He explained that “there were two clear handballs by [Villarreal's] Bruno [Soriano on Sunday]. They were clear. I’ve also seen the one by Mascherano, but there's no need to talk about intentions… They're clear." 
With regards to what he said and to who as he went down the tunnel after the game -- he shouted up to the stands "you've seen that, you've seen that at Javier Tebas -- he said: “The person I said it to knew that it was for them. Everyone doesn’t have to know [who they were for].” 

He was also asked about referees regularly not giving decision in Barça's favour: “Every week they give more reason to what I said [after Athletic]. You can see for yourselves [the refereeing decisions going against Barca]. It’s crystal clear what’s happened on the pitch today."

As for Barcelona's title options after the draw at Villarreal, which saw them slip five points behind Real Madrid, the Catalan defender remains optimistic. 
"Nothing is lost and I am convinced we can turn the situation around," he added. We can still win the league, but we have to change a lot of things.”
